post.author: Admin
post.title: Thank You Rhythm & Raffle Sponsors and Donors!
post.description: The North Royalton Band Boosters gratefully thank the following for supporting the Rhythm & Raff
post.content:
The North Royalton Band Boosters gratefully thank the following for supporting the Rhythm & Raffle on Febraury 24, 2018:

GOLD LEVEL SPONSORS

  • eVentus
  • Mastro’s The 3 Spot
  • Royalton Music Center
  • Royalton Psychological Associates, LLC

SILVER LEVEL SPONSORS

  • The Kern Family
  • On the Spot Dry Cleaners
  • Soaring Financial
  • The Royalton Recorder
  • Simply Catered Cupcakes
  • Mayor Robert Stefanik
  • Trivs Restaurant and Lounge

BRONZE LEVEL SPONSORS

  • North Royalton Council President Larry Antoskiewicz
  • The Butler Family
  • Michael and Susan Charles
  • The Dezzutti Family
  • Giant Eagle
  • The Johnstone Family

Your generosity helps students in the North Royalton band program grow and learn through music!
